text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump The job surge we’re seeing is the government forcing Americans to go back to work despite the Coronavirus threat.  The government is willing to accept American deaths to get the economy back on track for GENOCIDE TRUMP’s re-election bid. The same mentality that got us here.
